item.title: 顶级基金经理称，特朗普政策可能加剧债券市场对通胀的担忧
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的移民和贸易政策，监管着超过 20 万亿美元资金的美国巨型资产管理公司预计价格压力将持续存在，这种情况很可能在今年继续威胁债券市场。【原文：Giant U.S. asset managers overseeing well over $20 trillion are anticipating continued price pressures because of President Donald Trump's immigration and trade policies, a scenario that will likely keep threatening the bond market this year.】

item.title: 康卡斯特推出体育与新闻电视套餐吸引流媒体用户
item.description: 康卡斯特周四宣布推出面向其 Xfinity 互联网用户的新视频套餐 "Sports & News TV"，这是其在流媒体时代保持竞争力战略的一部分。【原文：Comcast announced on Thursday the launch of Sports & News TV, a new video package for its Xfinity internet customers, as part of its strategy to remain competitive in the streaming era.】

item.title: 特朗普表示将立即要求降低利率
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四表示，他将要求立即降息，其他国家也应效仿。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday said he would demand that interest rates drop immediately, and that other countries should follow suit.】

item.title: 特朗普致全球企业：在美国生产产品或面临关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四在世界经济论坛上表示，企业如果想避免面临关税，就应该在美国生产产品。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump told the World Economic Forum on Thursday that businesses should make their products in the United States if they want to avoid facing a tariff.】

item.title: 意大利航天局称，意大利与星链公司的交易不会带来安全风险
item.description: 意大利国家航天局（ASI）局长周四表示，意大利与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的Starlink公司之间可能达成的安全卫星通信协议不会带来安全风险。【原文：A possible deal between Italy and Elon Musk's Starlink for secure satellite communications would not pose a security risk, the head of national space agency ASI said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商向欧盟法院提出关税挑战
item.description: 欧盟法院网站周四公布的文件显示，中国电动汽车（EV）制造商比亚迪、吉利和上汽已向欧盟法院（CJEU）提出对欧盟进口关税的质疑。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle (EV) makers BYD , Geely and SAIC have challenged the EU's import tariffs at the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU), filings on the court's website showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）在推进数字化进程中裁员 6
item.description: 根据路透社周四看到的一份内部备忘录，华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）旗下的 CNN 将裁员约 6%，因为这家电视新闻媒体将继续把重点转向更加以数字为中心的战略。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery-owned CNN will lay off about 6% of its workforce as the TV news outlet continues to shift its focus toward a more digital-centric strategy, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 马来西亚国家石油公司称康菲石油公司成为马来西亚天然气项目的唯一运营商
item.description: 马来西亚国家石油公司（Petronas）周四表示，该公司已正式将其在该国一组油气田的承包权转让给美国康菲石油公司（ConocoPhillips）的一个部门。【原文：Malaysia's Petronas on Thursday said it has officially transferred its contractual right for a cluster of oil and gas fields in the country to a unit of US-based firm ConocoPhillips .】

item.title: PayPal 因网络安全失误被纽约罚款
item.description: 纽约州金融服务监督员阿德里安娜-哈里斯（Adrienne Harris）周四表示，PayPal 将因网络安全故障导致客户社保号码泄露而支付 200 万美元的民事罚款。【原文：PayPal will pay a $2 million civil fine over cybersecurity failures that led to the exposure of customers' Social Security numbers, New York state's financial services superintendent Adrienne Harris said on Thursday.】

item.title: 北方信托的季度利润增长超过四倍，原因是收费收入增加
item.description: 北方信托公司（Northern Trust）周四公布的第四季度利润增长了四倍多，超过了华尔街的预期，原因是股市反弹提高了这家财富管理公司的资产服务和管理收入。【原文：Northern Trust on Thursday reported a more than fourfold rise in fourth-quarter profit, beating Wall Street estimates, as a rallying equity market boosted the wealth manager's income from asset servicing and management.】

item.title: EA 股价暴跌，因年度预期下调，球迷担心足球特许经营权问题
item.description: 电子艺界（Electronic Arts）周四股价下挫 17%，原因是这家电子游戏生产商下调了年度预期，引发了人们对其足球专营权前景的担忧，而足球专营权一直是其游戏帝国的基石。【原文：Shares of Electronic Arts sank 17% on Thursday after the videogame maker cut its annual forecast, sparking fears over the future of its soccer franchise that has been a cornerstone of its gaming empire.】

item.title: 消息人士称，阿迪达斯将在总部裁员多达 500 人
item.description: 阿迪达斯首席执行官比约恩-古尔登（Bjoern Gulden）周四告诉路透社记者，阿迪达斯计划在德国体育零售商总部黑措根奥拉赫裁员多达 500 人。【原文：Adidas CEO Bjoern Gulden plans to cut up to 500 jobs at the German sport retailer's headquarters in Herzogenaurach, a source who took part in a meeting where the figure was announced told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 融创中国引入新投资者重组重庆湾项目
item.description: 陷入困境的房地产开发商融创中国周四表示，一家私人信贷公司将投资 24.8 亿元人民币（合 3.4034 亿美元）用于重庆项目的债务重组。【原文：Embattled property developer Sunac China on Thursday said a private credit firm will invest 2.48 billion Chinese yuan ($340.34 million) into restructuring debts for the Chongqing Project.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数略有增加
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量略有上升，表明 1 月份就业可能继续保持稳健增长。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits rose marginally last week, suggesting that solid job growth likely continued in January.】

item.title: 对冲基金在欧洲购买奢侈品、喝短酒和开车，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）称
item.description: 路透社周四看到的一份高盛周三的报告称，对冲基金对销售人们想要但不一定需要的东西（尤其是奢侈品）的欧洲公司转为乐观。【原文：Hedge funds have turned optimistic about European companies that sell things people want but don't necessarily need, especially luxury goods, according to a Goldman Sachs note on Wednesday seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席财务官在达沃斯表示将增加在美国的投资
item.description: 大众汽车公司首席财务官阿尔诺-安特利茨（Arno Antlitz）周四在瑞士达沃斯世界经济论坛（WEF）期间表示，大众汽车需要在美国追加投资，以实现在美国市场份额翻番的目标。【原文：Volkswagen will need to make additional investments in the United States to hit its target of doubling market share in the country, its CFO Arno Antlitz said on the sidelines of the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, Switzerland on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧盟对美国能源和武器销售谈判持开放态度以避免关税
item.description: 欧盟最高经济官员周四表示，欧盟愿意讨论从美国购买能源和武器的问题，以抵御美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对欧盟征收的关税。【原文：The European Union is open to discussing purchases of energy and arms from the United States to ward off tariffs that President Donald Trump has threatened to impose on the bloc, EU's top economy official said on Thursday.】

item.title: 辣椒酱生产商麦考密克预测，由于需求放缓、支出增加，全年销售额和利润将不温不火
item.description: Cholula 辣酱生产商麦考密克周四预计全年销售额和利润将低于分析师预期，原因是其香料和调味品需求持续下滑，尤其是在中国，以及营销费用增加。【原文：Cholula hot sauce maker McCormick forecast annual sales and profit below analysts' estimates on Thursday, hurt by a persistent slump in demand for its spices and condiments, especially in China, as well as higher marketing expenses.】

item.title: 自由港麦克莫兰公司第四季度利润超出预期
item.description: 受铜价上涨的帮助，矿业公司 Freeport-McMoRan 周四公布的第四季度利润超出预期。【原文：Miner Freeport-McMoRan beat fourth-quarter profit estimates on Thursday, helped by higher copper prices.】

item.title: 联合太平洋铁路公司季度利润增长 7
item.description: 铁路运营商联合太平洋公司周四公布，受谷物和化肥运输量增加以及核心价格上涨的帮助，第四季度利润增长了 7%。【原文：Railroad operator Union Pacific reported a 7% increase in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by more grain and fertilizer shipments and core pricing gains.】

item.title: KCC 称洛杉矶火灾保险损失估计达 280 亿美元
item.description: 巨灾风险建模公司 KCC 预计，洛杉矶野火造成的保险损失约为 280 亿美元，成为美国历史上损失最惨重的野火。【原文：Catastrophe risk modeling firm KCC is estimating insured losses of about $28 billion from the Los Angeles wildfires, making them the costliest wildfires in U.S. history.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会调查欧盟稳定币持有者安全网的深度
item.description: 欧盟委员会正在调查欧盟关于加密资产的规则在多大程度上保护了该集团投资者对相同电子货币代币（EMT）的赎回权，这些代币的价值与单一官方货币的价值挂钩。【原文：The European Commission is investigating the extent to which EU rules on crypto assets protect the redemption rights of the bloc's investors in identical e-money tokens (EMTs), the value of which is pegged to that of a single official currency.】

item.title: 美国航空公司因战略失误，预计 2025 年利润下滑
item.description: 美国航空公司（American Airlines）周四预测 2025 年利润低于华尔街预期，原因是喷气机燃油价格上涨，以及努力纠正销售策略失误导致企业旅客流失。【原文：American Airlines forecast 2025 profit below Wall Street expectations on Thursday, hurt by an uptick in jet fuel prices and efforts to fix a sales-strategy misstep that drove away corporate travelers.】

item.title: 摩根大通削减巴拿马对特朗普威胁 "收回 "运河的看法
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周加大威胁要收回巴拿马运河之后，美国投资银行摩根大通下调了对巴拿马债券的建议评级。【原文：U.S. investment bank JPMorgan has downgraded its recommendation on Panama's bonds after U.S. President Donald Trump ramped up his threat this week to take back the Panama canal.】

item.title: 据《经理人》杂志报道，宝马首席执行官不会将合同延长至 2026 年夏季之后
item.description: 德国《经理人》杂志周四援引一位熟悉内情的消息人士的话报道称，宝马公司首席执行官奥利弗-齐普斯（Oliver Zipse）在明年夏天合同到期后将不再续约。【原文：BMW Chief Executive Oliver Zipse will not extend his contract beyond the summer of next year, when it expires, Germany's manager magazin reported on Thursday, citing a source familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 世贸组织负责人称贸易战将对全球经济增长造成 "灾难性 "影响
item.description: 世界贸易组织总裁周四在讨论美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁时表示，任何针锋相对的贸易战都将给全球经济增长带来灾难性后果。【原文：The World Trade Organization chief said on Thursday that any tit-for-tat trade wars would have catastrophic consequences for global growth in a debate where U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff threats were discussed.】

item.title: General Atlantic 首席执行官表示对 TikTok 在美国的交易持乐观态度
item.description: 投资公司 General Atlantic 的首席执行官、TikTok 母公司的董事会成员周四表示，他对达成让短视频应用继续在美国运营的协议感到乐观。【原文：The CEO of investment firm General Atlantic, a board member of TikTok's parent company, said on Thursday that he was optimistic that a deal to keep the short-video app operating in the United States would be agreed.】

item.title: 通用电气航空航天集团（GE Aerospace）预计 2025 年利润将高于预期，原因是售后市场需求强劲
item.description: 通用电气航空航天公司（GE Aerospace）周四预计今年的利润将高于预期，原因是新飞机的持续短缺迫使航空公司改飞老式喷气式飞机，从而对其高利润率的零部件和服务产生了强劲需求。【原文：GE Aerospace on Thursday forecast profit for the current year above estimates, as persistent shortage of new aircraft forces airlines to fly older jets, creating strong demand for its high-margin parts and services.】

item.title: 早间竞价：股市徘徊在新纪录附近，石油退潮
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 解释：特朗普称企业多元化努力是非法的--但真的是这样吗？
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统发布了一项行政命令，旨在消除联邦政府和私营部门的劳动力多样性、公平和包容（DEI）举措。特朗普表示，如果一些公司的计划被认为具有歧视性，它们将面临调查和法律诉讼。【原文：President Donald Trump has issued an executive order designed to eradicate workforce diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) initiatives in the federal government and the private sector. Trump suggested that some companies will face investigations and legal action if their programs are deemed to be discriminatory.】
